Chapel Hill. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google Inc. for the last decade. The results speak for themselves,'' he said. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google Inc. still has such incredible opportunity-- we are nly at the beginning and I can't wait to get started. `` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Page said.
